info.name: Ecloud Drop Account
info.summary: postDelete actions dedicated to /e/ cloud setup
info.description: in /e/ cloud selfhosting setup, nextcloud accounts are linked to mail accounts and some other things. This app complete the account deletion by cleaning other part of the /e/ cloud setup to ensure no more data is retained when a user request an account deletion. This app use the postDelete User hook to invoke scripts in the docker-welcome container of /e/ cloud setup
info.author: Florent VINCENT
